---
category: news
title: "Seniors less receptive to telemedicine and uncomfortable with AI interpreting medical results: S'pore survey"
excerpt: "A survey by the Singapore Eye Research Institute (Seri) during the circuit breaker last year found that about 55 per cent of 520 people aged 60 and above were unlikely to use digital medical services if the Covid-19 pandemic continues."
